string.text: Anyone who can hear me—guys, help!
I’m pinned down in a yard. Help me out, brothers!
Watch out for mines—a sapper only makes one mistake...
Stalker, you’re approaching the Barrier. Don’t try anything funny, but we welcome any help.
Cease fire immediately! Disobedience will be punished by death!
Attention! For violating the law on the use of weapons on Duty territory, stalker Marked One has been declared a criminal.
Attention! Order to all personnel on Duty territory! Eliminate the Marked One immediately!

Marked One, about Strelok. A stalker came back from a deep raid—goes by Fox. Looks like he’s in bad shape and asking for help. Says he dragged a pack of some creatures right on his tail and won’t hold out for long. He might know something about Strelok. Move it—I’m sending you the coordinates.
Stay sharp. We attack strictly on my command.
Victory! Marked One, come here—we need to talk.
Hey there, Marked One! Glad you’re alive and made it back to the Cordon. Drop by, we’ll have a chat. Another job’s shaping up.

Everyone, take positions. Let them come closer so we finish them for sure.
Good job, guys—we took them down! Everyone rest up, and you, stalker, come over here. Let’s talk.

Attention everyone! This is Bes, commander of the neutral squad. We pushed the bandits out of the abandoned vehicle lot, but we expect a counterattack. We’re short on manpower, so anyone who can help—join us.
Marked One! The military attacked the bandit base. They’ve blocked the exit to Garbage. But there’s an old road leading south. Try to get out that way, and be careful. Good luck.
People, help! A bloodsucker tore me up bad... I’m dying!\nI’m in the building near the gas station, on the second floor... won’t last long... hurry...

Excellent, Marked One! The emission has been shut down, and you’re alive. We’ve called in a couple of military helicopters to clear the nearby area of zombies, so be careful—don’t get caught in the crossfire. And please, drop by our bunker when you have the chance.
Help! Can anyone see this message?! Monsters attacked us...\nI don’t know where I am. I’m hiding on the roof of an old shed for now. I can see a tower nearby—probably a water tower. Save me!
People, save me! I’m in bad shape... bandits beat me up and left me to die. Coordinates attached.
